original_text:
Their cobwebs are useless for clothing;
    they cannot cover themselves with what they make.
Their deeds are evil deeds,
    and acts of violence are in their hands.
korean_text: 그 짠 것으로는 옷을 이룰 수 없을 것이요 그 행위로는 자기를 가릴 수 없을 것이며 그 행위는 죄악의 행위라 그 손에는 포악한 행동이 있으며

sentences.original_text: Their cobwebs are useless for clothing
they cannot cover themselves with what they make
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들이 만든 것으로 자신을 덮을 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: and acts of violence are in their hands
